name: Mr. Donovan
description: Harness your MOBA skills, and dominate the first of the SOBOs! Discover the Single-player Online Battle Open-world genre, fight for your life, explore an alien planet, defend your crashed ship, survive arena battles, encounter intelligent adversaries, and earn the love of appropriately odd pets.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 3+ GHz Dual Core Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6000 series or NVIDIA GeForece 500 series DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
